messages.messageBody:
<brian_jen@...> wrote:
> I have to file for the first time this year in MA since my daugter
is now 6. I was looking for a sample ed plan for unschoolers. I
think someone on this site posted a link to one a few weeks ago, but I
can't find it. I was woundering if someeone could send me a sample ed
plan that they have used so I can know where to begin as I write mine.>

Hi Jen,
I'm in MA too, this is our first year, dd is 13. My ed plan is a lot
like the one on the ahem.info site. It's for middle school but I'd
be happy to email it to you if you want to take a look at it!
Jann

messages.subject: ed plan for MA
messages.msgSnippet: I have to file for the first time this year in MA since my daugter is now 6.  I was looking for a sample ed plan for unschoolers.  I think someone on this site
messages.messageBody:
I have to file for the first time this year in MA since my daugter is
now 6. I was looking for a sample ed plan for unschoolers. I think
someone on this site posted a link to one a few weeks ago, but I can't
find it. I was woundering if someeone could send me a sample ed plan
that they have used so I can know where to begin as I write mine.

Thanks,

Jen
